document_data.title: Defiance in Phlan
document_data.realm year: [[1489 DR]]<ref>{{cite web/Phlan during the Tyranny of Dragons}}<ref>
document_data.Summary: The adventure starts off at Madame Freona's Tea Kettle, where adventurers are approached by a series of agents from the [[Harpers]], the [[Order of the Gauntlet]], the [[Emerald Enclave]], the Lords' Alliance, and in turn the [[Zhentarim]]. Each subsequent mission leads the party to cross paths with the plots of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] and a number of [[draconic]] leads. These include a deal for a [[blue dragon]] tooth, the former lair of a [[black dragon]], a [[polymorph]]ed [[green dragon]], a stolen dragon egg, and a map to the lair of a [[white dragon]].
